glowfix.settings.enabled.name: Enable glowing entities
glowfix.settings.enabled.description: Whether to show an outline for glowing entities, like in 1.9+. Note: glowing data needs to be sent by the server.
glowfix.settings.glowSelf.name: Enable glowing self
glowfix.settings.glowSelf.description: Whether to enable glowing for yourself in third-person view
glowfix.settings.alwaysGlowSelf.name: Always glow self
glowfix.settings.alwaysGlowSelf.descript: Whether to enable glowing for yourself even when not supported by the server. Useful for troubleshooting.
glowfix.settings.header.colors.name: Colors
glowfix.settings.useVanillaColors.name: Use vanilla glow colors
glowfix.settings.useVanillaColors.descri: Whether to use the vanilla team colors for glow effects. Disable to unlock the Custom glow colors setting.
glowfix.settings.customColors.name: Custom glow colors
glowfix.settings.customColors.black.name: Black
glowfix.settings.customColors.gold.name: Gold
glowfix.settings.customColors.gray.name: Gray
glowfix.settings.customColors.blue.name: Blue
glowfix.settings.customColors.green.name: Green
glowfix.settings.customColors.aqua.name: Aqua
glowfix.settings.customColors.red.name: Red
glowfix.settings.customColors.white.name: White
